name: Cîroc
select: Vodka is defined as a neutral-flavoured, clear spirit. That basically means that vodka is supposed to be virtually tasteless, odorless, and clear (like water) in color.

name: Gin
select: Gin is a clear spirit and it mixes well with other ingredients. But what makes gin different is that it’s flavored with various botanicals to give gin its distinct taste.

name: Whiskey
select: whisk(e)y is a spirit that’s distilled from fermented grains. Whisk(e)y is different to vodka because whisk(e)y is aged/matured in wooden barrels for a period of time after distillation.

name: Scotch
select: Vodka is defined as a neutral-flavoured, clear spirit.
